content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) with inventory: {'coal': 19} and status: no ingredients to smelt
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0)) with inventory: {'coal': 11} and produces {'copper-plate': 90}

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. You encountered errors when trying to insert copper ore into the furnaces without having them in your inventory.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have the necessary crafting machines or furnaces available to craft items. You faced errors while trying to craft electronic circuits and copper cables due to insufficient copper plates, which require a furnace to produce.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing items into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. You encountered issues with inserting items into furnaces that were not ready to accept them.

### Repeated errors when crafting copper cables
- You repeatedly faced errors while attempting to craft copper cables due to the unavailability of copper plates. Ensure you have sufficient copper plates produced in the furnace before attempting to craft copper cables.
